alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton County through 430 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Horseshoe Lake, or 14 miles southwest of Tupper Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue Mountain Lake, Eighth Lake Campground, Lake Eaton Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Forked Lake Public Campground, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Long Lake, Hasbroucks, Nehasane, Eagle Nest, Quaker Beach, Deerland, Sabattis, Partlow, Robinwood, Woods, Little Tupper Lake, Sagamore Lake and Lake Lila. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
